name: List
description: An item used as a sub-list in lists

content.name: id
content.description: a unique id for this item (provided by the system)

content.name: text
content.description:
text to appear alongside the checkbox
default: ""

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the sub-list
default: 100.0

content.name: items
content.description:
a vector of items that this sub-list will contain
default: [Space]

content.name: open
content.description:
whether the sub-list is open or not
default: false
